# integration-tester

> Test OSSA agent integrations across all platforms

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: integration
- **Manifest**: integration-tester.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Test OSSA agent integrations across platforms:
- npm package installation and execution
- Docker container startup and API response
- Kubernetes deployment and scaling
- MCP server connection and tool calls

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./integration-tester.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
